Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Ahem... Welcome, everyone, to the grand launch of my very first autobiography novel!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao rolls a piece of paper into a tube as if she is speaking into a microphone.'}
{2: 'Autobiography?', 3: '7'}
{3: "In a modest lounge in Kowloon, you, as an invited guest, are taking part in the rehearsal for Pulao's latest novel launch."}
{3: 'But before stepping into the lounge, you never expected that you would be the only attendee at this rehearsal.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "First and foremost, I want to dedicate my thanks to Kowloong and Lady Qu. Without them, I couldn't have completed this work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Next, I'd like to extend a special thank you to all my friends who are here today, the Kowloong Crew, Commandant, and...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao picks up her script and quickly puts it back down after a glance.'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Anyway! This novel is a blend of my personal experience as a member of the Pulao Crew, d-drawing inspiration from the knowledge found in many Kowloong antique books! I hope you enjoy reading it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After delivering her speech in one breath, Pulao stands up, visibly nervous, almost bumping into a stool.'}
{3: 'With a deep bow, she discreetly applauds herself while still maintaining her bent posture.'}
{2: '(Quickly join in with applause)', 3: '19'}
{3: 'Hearing your applause, Pulao quickly lifts her head to look at you.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What do you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Very professional.', 3: '24', 4: 'I think it could use a little adjustment?', 5: '26'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hehe, I knew it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hmm? Is it about the order of thanks? Should I mention the book title at the start...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Rest assured. I'll definitely remember to mention your name! Special thanks to 【kuroname】!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Speaking of which...', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Mind if I read it first?', 3: '32'}
{3: "As the abrupt silence swiftly chills the atmosphere, Pulao's gaze unconsciously averts from yours."}
{3: 'She slowly shuffles over to the desk, then quickly reaches out to clutch the manuscript to her chest.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's just that I still haven't made up my mind on a few parts! Alright.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After another moment of silence, Pulao hands over the manuscript she is holding.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I've already told the Kowloong Crew that I'd give a copy to everyone, and I've sorted things out with the printing house. Just a few days away from printing now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "If you don't mind, feel free to tell me your opinions! It's a bit embarrassing to ask others for help, heehee...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Pulao hurries over to your side, displaying the first part of the story. Her handwriting meets your eyes, mixed with drawings and edits at the paper's edges."}
